search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Customers.ai (customersai.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: I located the official pricing page for Customers.ai here: [https://customers.ai/pricing](https://customers.ai/pricing).

extracted_content.content:
Identity Resolution Priced for Maximum ROI
------------------------------------------

Choose the plan tailored to your growth goals

Tap a plan name to learn more about maximizing conversions and advanced customer journey insights for Meta Ads, Emails, or our plans for Agencies

Restore website visitor retargeting ad audiences and conversion signals

![Image 1](https://customers.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Meta-Partner@2x.png)

![Image 2](https://customers.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Facebook-partner@2x.png)

![Image 3](https://customers.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Google-Partner-512.png)

### For Advertisers

Starts at

$199

/mo  
**\+ identifier visitor fees**

for 7 Days

No credit card required

What You Get

*   Enriched and targetable contact data for both known profiles and unknown anonymous visitors
*   Encrypted audiences sent to Google Ads, Meta Ads Custom Audiences and Meta Conversions API
*   Fully restore signal loss due to Meta Pixel cookie deprecation

Customers.ai for Meta Advertisers Guarantee

##### Customers.ai for Meta Advertisers Event Match Quality Score Guarantee

See an improvement in one or more key Meta metrics in 90 days or cancel anytime.

*   25% or more Increase in Event Match Quality Score 
*   15% or more increase in conversions
*   20% or more increase in engagement rates
*   20% or more decrease in CAC
*   20% or more increase in ROAS

Identify anonymous website visitors and supercharge email flows

### For Email Marketers

Starts at

$199

/mo  
**\+ identified visitor fees**

for 7 Days

No credit card required

What You Get

*   Contact data and on-site behavior tracking of identified visitors
*   Fully restore returning contact signal loss due to third-party cookie deprecation
*   Native or API integration with ESPs, CRMs and direct mail solutions
*   Consumer or business contact enrichment
*   Advanced audience segmentation
*   Persistent customer journey tracking
*   Suite of email deliverability optimization tools

Improve ad performance and supercharge email flows

![Image 4](https://customers.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Meta-Partner@2x.png)

![Image 5](https://customers.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Facebook-partner@2x.png)

![Image 6](https://customers.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Google-Partner-512.png)

### For Advertisers & Email Marketers

Starts at

$399

/mo  
**\+ identified visitor fees**

for 7 Days

No credit card required

What You Get

*   Contact data and on-site behavior tracking of identified visitors
*   Fully restore signal loss due to Meta Pixel and third-party cookie deprecation
*   Encrypted audiences sent to Google Ads, Meta Ads and Meta Conversions API
*   Native or API integration with ESPs, CRMs and direct mail solutions
*   Consumer or business contact enrichment
*   Advanced audience segmentation
*   Persistent customer journey tracking
*   Suite of email deliverability optimization tools

Customers.ai for Meta Advertisers Guarantee

##### Customers.ai for Meta Advertisers Event Match Quality Score Guarantee

See an improvement in one or more key Meta metrics in 90 days or cancel anytime.

*   25% or more Increase in Event Match Quality Score 
*   15% or more increase in conversions
*   20% or more increase in engagement rates
*   20% or more decrease in CAC
*   20% or more increase in ROAS

Grow your agency with invested partners and elite campaign performance

![Image 7](https://customers.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Agency-artner.png)

### Advertising & Email Marketing

with our Agency Partnership Team to learn more

What You Get

*   Agency partner promotion
*   New business referrals
*   Agency partner software training
*   Improved client results using Customers.ai

### HighLevel Agency

about our White Label plan for HighLevel Agencies

![Image 8](https://customers.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Agency-artner.png)

What You Get

*   White label website visitor contact data
*   HighLevel integration

Get Website Visitor ID X-Ray Pixel, 500 website visitor contacts, ad retargeting audience recovery and email automation free for 7 days, no card required.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes a base subscription fee plus additional fees for identified visitor services.
